Name: s.astype()
Comments: Need to be careful to NaN values when convert between float/double and integer

Name: s.apply()
Usage: Invoke function on values of Series
Comments: Very flexible function that you must practice a lot

Name: df.apply()
Usage: Apply a function along an axis of the DataFrame
Comments: When you need to apply a function on multiple columns

Name: df.explode()
Usage: Transform each element of a list-like to a row, replicating the index values
Comments: When you used df.apply to return multiple column in a list, then translate them back to columns
